name: ProjectIII
description:
My very first Unity game!

Instructions:

  • Press Space to jump.
    • To double-jump, press Space again in the air.
    • To triple-jump:
      • Start on the ground.
      • Jump once.
      • Then jump again the moment you touch the ground.
      • You will know you pulled it off when you see the run-jump animation.
      • From here you have two more air jumps, making a total of three.
      • Do note that this technique requires skill. (This was actually a bug that emerged when I was trying to make the feel of the jump more responsive. I thought it was cool so I made it part of the game)
  • Collect the successes (green +’s) to increase your score.
  • Dodge the mistakes (red x’s) or the deadline will get closer.
  • If the deadline reaches you, game over.
  • Every so often an extension (clock) will appear.
    •  In order to obtain it, you need to triple jump.
  • To use an extension, press Q. This will push the deadline back.
    • Can only be used up to a certain point.

Edit: Please see attached a Practice version of the game in addition to the original. I figured that beginners would need an easier version of the game to practice triple-jumping.
